thread.title: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces regular quarterly dividend
thread.title_full: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces regular quarterly dividend

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces regular quarterly dividend
text:
Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces regular quarterly dividend   
Aug 13, 2015 Banners   
STAMFORD, CT - Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc today announced that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.375 per share. 
The regular quarterly dividend will be paid on September 25, 2015 to stockholders of record on September 11, 2015.
